title: Meredith and Derek's Complicated Romance
description: Meredith and Derek's relationship begins with a one-night stand and evolves into a complicated romance, affecting their professional lives and friendships.
interfering_episode_characters: George O'Malley; Izzie Stevens; Zona Cruz; Jorge Cruz
single_episode_progression_string: Derek flirts with Meredith, which annoys her, highlighting the ongoing complexity and tension in their relationship. Derek pulls Meredith aside and reminds her it was Jorge and Zona's decision to proceed with the surgery.

title: Intern Dynamics and Challenges
description: The new interns at Seattle Grace Hospital face various challenges as they adjust to their roles, navigate relationships, and compete for opportunities.
main_characters: Meredith Grey; Cristina Yang; Izzie Stevens; George O'Malley; Alex Karev
interfering_episode_characters: Richard Webber; Preston Burke; Miranda Bailey; Elizabeth 'Liz' Fallon
single_episode_progression_string: Izzie, Meredith, and George prepare for their day, with George feeling uncomfortable about Izzie's behavior. Izzie's patient refuses her help, leading to Bailey scolding her. George talks to Izzie and Meredith about his frustrations. Alex mocks Izzie by exposing her modeling past. Cristina is teased by Liz about impressing Burke.

title: Meredith's Family Legacy and Personal Struggles
description: Meredith grapples with her mother's legacy as a renowned surgeon and her own personal struggles, including her mother's Alzheimer's diagnosis.
interfering_episode_characters: Elizabeth 'Liz' Fallon; Richard Webber; Ellis Grey
single_episode_progression_string: Liz Fallon, who was Ellis Grey's scrub nurse, is admitted to Seattle Grace. Meredith visits her mother and feels upset because Ellis remembers Liz but not Meredith. Meredith visits Liz, and they talk about Ellis.

title: George's Struggles and Growth
description: George O'Malley faces challenges as an intern, dealing with self-doubt and striving to prove himself in a competitive environment.
single_episode_progression_string: George is uncomfortable with Izzie's behavior and complains about it. He researches nail gun cases to help with Jorge's surgery. George continues to bring up the morning's events and argues with Izzie about buying tampons.

title: Medical Case: Jorge Cruz's Nail Gun Injury
description: The medical team at Seattle Grace deals with a complex trauma case involving a patient with multiple nails embedded in his head.
interfering_episode_characters: Meredith Grey; Zona Cruz; Alex Karev
single_episode_progression_string: Derek's patient, Jorge Cruz, injured himself by falling down the stairs with a nail gun. Sixteen nails are in his head, and his condition is worsening. Jorge's wife, Zona, must decide about the risky surgery to remove the nails. Meredith tries to convince Zona to reconsider, but Zona insists on proceeding.

title: Izzie's Modeling Past Exposed
description: Izzie Stevens faces embarrassment and professional challenges when her past as a model is exposed at the hospital.
single_episode_progression_string: Izzie is shocked to see her modeling past exposed when Alex prints large photos of her and puts them everywhere. Izzie confronts Alex and defends her choices, explaining she graduated debt-free.

title: Liz Fallon's Final Days
description: The hospital staff deals with the emotional impact of a veteran scrub nurse's terminal condition and her decision to die at Seattle Grace.
interfering_episode_characters: Preston Burke; Richard Webber; Meredith Grey
single_episode_progression_string: Cristina is assigned to Liz Fallon, who teases her about impressing Burke. Liz learns from Richard that Meredith works at Seattle Grace. Liz's condition worsens, and she dies later that evening because she had signed a DNR.
